arcade.util

Class MiniBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.util.MiniBox

  • public class MiniBox
extends java.lang.Object
    Container that maps a key to a value.

    MiniBox objects are dictionaries that use a String to String hashmap. Utility methods are provided to return the contents as specific types.

    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.3.2
